changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE campaigns ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(256), start_date TIMESTAMP, end_date TIMESTAMP, budget BIGINT, actual_cost BIGINT, type VARCHAR(256), updated_by VARCHAR(256), created_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(256), is_deleted TINYINT );
